question: In the simple mechanical governor, the:
options: 1) Flyweight centrifugal force is balanced by spring pressure
2) Centrifugal force rotates the ball head
3) Flyweight centrifugal force is balanced by hydraulic pres sure
4) Speeder spring actuates the fuel control rod

question: The requirement for portable fire equipment is .........................

question: Water in the lube oil system may be detected by: I. sounding lube oil tanks with water sensitive paste; II. observing the purifier discharge.
When the oil in the seperator is decreasing, which place cannot be leaking?
options: 5) The o-ring at shock water entrance to separator into shockwater
correctAnswer: 5) The o-ring at shock water entrance to separator into shockwater

question: When a cargo hose joint or coupling starts to leak badly the attempt you should do is to ............................
options: 1) Reduce pumping pressure and wrag leak securely
2) Shut down transfer and make repairs
3) Soak spill with sawdust and reduce pumping pressure
4) Wash deck immediately and close tank tops
correctAnswer: 2) Shut down transfer and make repairs

question: A fire sprinkling system must be fitted ...........................
options: 2) In conjunction with the CO2 system
3) With a pressure tank of fresh water to the supply system pending the starting of the pump
correctAnswer: 2) In conjunction with the CO2 system

options: 1) The relief filters should be readjusted
2) The filters and strainers should be checked frequently

correctAnswer: 2) The filters and strainers should be checked frequently

question: Trunk type diesel engine pistons are most effectively cooled when heat is:

correctAnswer: 5) Transferred to water cooled cylinder walls
